status.itemStatusDescription:
Content Editors may make changes to this item.
Once the changes are complete they may submit the item for approval

information.title: Default JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
information.content:
JARVIS roles: 

  • Centre Manager
  • Premium / Tier 3 Centre Manager
  • Order Management - Leader
  • Tier 3 / SMB Leader

information.title: SMB JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
information.content:
JARVIS roles: 

  • Order Management
  • SMB Agent
  • SMB - TDS (Team Member)
  • SMB - Loop (Team Member)
  • SMB - CSS (Team Member)
  • SMB - TDS (VIP)

information.title: Retail JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
information.content:
JARVIS roles: 

  • Retail Operations Manager
  • Sales and Service (Retail)
  • Sales and Service (Retail) Leader
  • Sales and Service (Retail) Senior
  • Service Specialist (Retail)
  • Technical Specialist (Retail)

information.title: Customer Payment Support and Advocacy Assist JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
information.content:
JARVIS roles:

  • Collections Agent
  • Collections Agent - Leader
  • Collections Team Leader (Onshore)

information.title: GCC JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
information.content:
JARVIS roles:

  • Fixed Onboarding
  • Fixed Service Tier 1
  • Fixed Service Tier 2
  • Fixed Service Tier 3
  • Live Chat Agent
  • Mobile Service Tier 1
  • Mobile Service Tier 2
  • Mobile Service Tier 3
  • Operations Manager
  • Premium Support Live Chat Agent
  • Premium Support Live Chat Leader
  • Sales Webchat Agent
  • Sales Webchat Leader
  • Social Agent
  • Tier 1 Leader
  • TV & Content

information.title: CRT JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
Specialist Care JARVIS Credit Reason Code roles
information.content:
JARVIS roles: 

  • Specialist Care Expert (Vulnerability)
  • Specialist Care Expert (Coach)
  • Specialist Care Expert (Manager)

fields.name: Text
fields.value: This page provides a list of JARVIS credit reason codes. It's for all Experts / Consultants and Coaches.

fields.name: Text
fields.value:
The JARVIS credit reason code table includes:

  • JARVIS credit reason codes
  • Descriptions,
  • Which business areas can access them
  • Whether they apply at the charge or account level
  • If they are experience or corrective credits

fields.name: Text
fields.value: Details

fields.name: HTMLText
fields.value:
Use the search bar below with up to 2 or 3 keywords to locate what you're looking for. If you can't find it, please submit your search feedback.

Keyword Search

fields.name: Text
fields.value:
JARVIS Roles explained: Default | SMB | Retail | Customer Payment Support and Advocacy Assist | Global Contact Centre (GCC) | CRT | Specialist Care

Reason Code

Reason Code Description

JARVIS Roles

Applicable Level

Corrective or Experience

Acc CR - Collection Only - Hardship
  • Can be used when managing the customer experience for customers that are facing financial hardship
  • Default
  • Customer Payment Support and Advocacy Assist
  • Specialist Care
  • Account
  • Experience

Account Level Credit
  • Crediting charges where a single line-item credit is necessary
  • Default
  • SMB
  • Retail
  • CRT
  • Specialist Care
  • Account
  • Corrective
  • Experience

Collections Credit - Reactivation Cancel Fee
  • Credits for reactivating an affiliate order that was incorrectly cancelled due to non-payment
  • Default
  • Customer Payment Support and Advocacy Assist
  • GCC
  • Account
  • Corrective
  • Experience

Collections Credit - Reactivation Handset
  • Credit for reversing a payout fee and reinstating the handset instalments
  • Default
  • Customer Payment Support and Advocacy Assist
  • GCC
  • Specialist Care
  • Account
  • Corrective

Connection / Relocation - Delayed
  • Customers may be eligible for credit when an NBN connection or relocation date is postponed due to NBN delays or an error by Optus
  • Default
  • SMB
  • Account
  • Corrective
  • Experience

  • Optus indicates the address is serviceable, but further checks reveal that installation cannot be completed
  • Default
  • SMB

  • Experience

  • Credit applied when an incorrect rate plan has been applied to a business account

  • SMB
